title: Did one of the host broadcasters tweet a survivor from Parkland "hot poker"?
subtitle: St. Louis wrote, "A middleman," Jimmy Olman said he was ready to throw a hot poker in David Hogg's ass.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Jimmy O'Malman is embarrassed about Parkland's flirting with the survivor and David Hogg's activist with a hot poker.
